item.title: Psalm 69
item.description:
“But I am poor and afflicted; let Your salvation, O God, help me.”
Listen and learn Psalm 69!
Psalms for Kids is read BY kids and created FOR kids. Be still and allow the words of the psalms to enter your mind and heart. Set an episode on repeat and memorize a passage or two. Psalms are integral in Orthodox Christian worship, chanted or sung at all services, from vespers to matins to the Divine Liturgy. As Fr. Thomas Hopko said, every expression of human emotion is found in the Book of Psalms. From joy to sorrow--to repentance to faith. All psalms in this series are taken from the Ancient Faith Psalter, generously translated by an anonymous group of monks.
